AddressFacet.description: An Address Facet is a grouping of characteristics unique to an administrative identifier for a geolocation associated with a specific identity.
AddressFacet.title: AddressFacet

AffiliationFacet.description: An affiliation is a grouping of characteristics unique to the established affiliations of an entity.
AffiliationFacet.title: AffiliationFacet

AnalyticTool.description: "An analytic tool is an artifact of hardware and/or software utilized to accomplish a task or purpose of explanation, interpretation or logical reasoning."

_creator.description: "The creator organization for a particular tool."

_references.description: "References to information describing a particular tool."

_version.description: "An appropriate version descriptor of a particular tool."

createdBy.description: The identity that created a characterization of a concept.

description.description: A human-readable description of an entity

externalReference.description: Specifies a reference to a resource outside of the UCO.

hasFacet.description: Further sets of properties characterizing a concept based on the particular context of the class and of the particular instance of the concept being characterized.

modifiedTime.description: Specifies the time that this particular version of the object was modified. The object creator can use the time it deems most appropriate as the time this version of the object was modified. The value of the modified property for a given object version MUST be later than or equal to the value of the created property. Object creators MUST update the modified property when creating a new version of an object. The modified timestamp MUST be precise to the nearest millisecond (exactly three digits after the decimal place in seconds).

name.description: The name of a particular concept characterization.

objectCreatedTime.description: The time at which a characterization of a concept is created. This time pertains to the time of creating the record object, and is not an intrinsic characteristic of the concept.

objectMarking.description: Marking definitions to be applied to a particular concept characterization in its entirety.

servicePack.description: "An appropriate service pack descriptor for a particular tool."

specVersion.description: The version of UCO ontology or subontology specification used to characterize a concept.

BirthInformationFacet.description: Birth information is a grouping of characteristics unique to information pertaining to the birth of an entity.
BirthInformationFacet.title: BirthInformationFacet

BuildFacet.description: "A build facet is a grouping of characteristics unique to a particular version of a software."

buildInformation.description: "Describes how a particular tool was built."

BuildFacet.title: BuildFacet

BuildInformationType.description: "A build information type is a grouping of characteristics that describe how a particular version of software was converted from source code to executable code."

buildConfiguration.description: "How the build utility was configured for a particular build of a particular software."

buildID.description: "An externally defined unique identifier for a particular build of a software."

buildLabel.description: "Relevant label for a particular build of a particular software."

buildOutputLog.description: "The output log of the build process for a software."

buildProject.description: "The project name of a build of a software."

buildScript.description: "The actual build script for a particular build of a particular software."

buildUtility.description: "Identifies the utility used to build a software."

buildVersion.description: "The appropriate version descriptor of a particular build of a particular software."

compilationDate.description: "The compilation date for the build of a software."

compilers.description: "The compilers utilized during a particular build of a particular software."

libraries.description: "The libraries incorporated into a particular build of a software."

BuildInformationType.title: BuildInformationType

BuildUtilityType.description: "A build utility type characterizes the tool used to convert from source code to executable code for a particular version of software."

_cpeid.description: "Specifies the Common Platform Enumeration identifier for the software."

_swid.description: "Specifies the SWID tag for the software."

buildUtilityName.description: "The informally defined name of the utility used to build a particular software."

BuildUtilityType.title: BuildUtilityType

Bundle.description: A bundle is a container for a grouping of UCO content with no presumption of shared context.

CompilerType.description: "A compiler type is a grouping of characteristics unique to a specific program that translates computer code written in one programming language (the source language) into another language (the target language). Typically a program that translates source code from a high-level programming language to a lower-level language (e.g., assembly language, object code, or machine code) to create an executable program. [based on https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Compiler]"

_cpeid.description: "Specifies the Common Platform Enumeration identifier for the software."

_swid.description: "Specifies the SWID tag for the software."

CompilerType.title: CompilerType

ConfidenceFacet.description: A confidence is a grouping of characteristics unique to an asserted level of certainty in the accuracy of some information.

confidence.description: An asserted level of certainty in the accuracy of some information.

ConfidenceFacet.title: ConfidenceFacet

Configuration.description: A configuration is a grouping of characteristics unique to a set of parameters or initial settings for the use of a tool, application, software, or other cyber object.

configurationEntry.description: A single configuration setting entry item for a tool or other software.

createdBy.description: The identity that created a characterization of a concept.

dependencies.description: The relevant configuration dependencies for a tool, application, software, or other cyber object.

ConfigurationEntry.description: A configuration entry is a grouping of characteristics unique to a particular parameter or initial setting for the use of a tool, application, software, or other cyber object.

itemDescription.description: A description of a configuration setting entry item.

itemName.description: The name of a configuration setting entry item.

itemObject.description: The structured value of a configuration setting entry instance.

itemValue.description: The value of a configuration setting entry instance.

ConfiguredTool.description: "A ConfiguredTool is a Tool that is known to be configured to run in a more specified manner than some unconfigured or less-configured Tool."

_references.description: "References to information describing a particular tool."

ContextualCompilation.description: A contextual compilation is a grouping of things sharing some context (e.g., a set of network connections observed on a given day, all accounts associated with a given person).

ControlledVocabulary.description: A controlled vocabulary is an explicitly constrained set of string values.

constrainingVocabularyName.description: The name of an explicitly constrained set of string values.

constrainingVocabularyReference.description: A reference to a specification for an explicitly constrained set of string values. The specification may be unstructured (e.g., web page listing string values) or structured (e.g. RDF/OWL enumeration).

EventsFacet.description: Events is a grouping of characteristics unique to information related to specific relevant things that happen in the lifetime of an entity.
EventsFacet.title: EventsFacet

ExternalReference.description: Characteristics of a reference to a resource outside of the UCO.

definingContext.description: A description of the context relevant to the definition of a particular external reference identifier.

externalIdentifier.description: An identifier for some information defined external to the UCO context.

referenceURL.description: A URL for some information defined external to the UCO context.

ExternalReference.title: ExternalReference

GPSCoordinatesFacet.description: A GPS coordinates facet is a grouping of characteristics unique to the expression of quantified dilution of precision (DOP) for an asserted set of geolocation coordinates typically associated with satellite navigation such as the Global Positioning System (GPS).

hdop.description: The horizontal dilution of precision of the GPS location.

pdop.description: The positional (3D) dilution of precision of the GPS location.

tdop.description: The temporal dilution of precision of the GPS location.

vdop.description: The vertical dilution of precision of the GPS location.

GPSCoordinatesFacet.title: GPSCoordinatesFacet

Grouping.description: A grouping is a compilation of referenced UCO content with a shared context.

context.description: A description of particular contextual affinity.

LanguagesFacet.description: Languages is a grouping of characteristics unique to specific syntactically and grammatically standardized forms of communication (human or computer) in which an entity has proficiency (comprehends, speaks, reads, or writes).
LanguagesFacet.title: LanguagesFacet

LatLongCoordinatesFacet.description: A lat long coordinates facet is a grouping of characteristics unique to the expression of a geolocation as the intersection of specific latitude, longitude, and altitude values.

altitude.description: The altitude coordinate of a geolocation.

latitude.description: The latitude coordinate of a geolocation.

longitude.description: The longitude coordinate of a geolocation.

objectCreatedTime.description: The time at which a characterization of a concept is created. This time pertains to the time of creating the record object, and is not an intrinsic characteristic of the concept.

objectMarking.description: Marking definitions to be applied to a particular concept characterization in its entirety.

servicePack.description: "An appropriate service pack descriptor for a particular tool."

specVersion.description: The version of UCO ontology or subontology specification used to characterize a concept.

MaliciousTool.title: MaliciousTool

MarkingDefinitionAbstraction.description: A marking definition abstraction is a grouping of characteristics unique to the expression of a specific data marking conveying restrictions, permissions, and other guidance for how marked data can be used and shared. This class is an ontological structural abstraction for this concept. Implementations of this concept should utilize the marking MarkingDefinition class.

createdBy.description: The identity that created a characterization of a concept.

description.description: A human-readable description of an entity

externalReference.description: Specifies a reference to a resource outside of the UCO.

hasFacet.description: Further sets of properties characterizing a concept based on the particular context of the class and of the particular instance of the concept being characterized.

modifiedTime.description: Specifies the time that this particular version of the object was modified. The object creator can use the time it deems most appropriate as the time this version of the object was modified. The value of the modified property for a given object version MUST be later than or equal to the value of the created property. Object creators MUST update the modified property when creating a new version of an object. The modified timestamp MUST be precise to the nearest millisecond (exactly three digits after the decimal place in seconds).

ModusOperandi.description: A modus operandi is a particular method of operation (how a particular entity behaves or the resources they use).

Organization.description: An organization is a grouping of identifying characteristics unique to a group of people who work together in an organized way for a shared purpose. [based on https://dictionary.cambridge.org/us/dictionary/english/organization]

Relationship.description: A relationship is a grouping of characteristics unique to an assertion that one or more objects are related to another object in some way.

kindOfRelationship.description: A characterization of the nature of a relationship between objects.

SimpleAddressFacet.description: A simple address facet is a grouping of characteristics unique to a geolocation expressed as an administrative address.

addressType.description: The type of the address, for instance home or work.

country.description: The name of the geolocation country.

locality.description: The name of the geolocation locality (e.g., city).

region.description: The name of the geolocation region (e.g., state).

SimpleAddressFacet.title: SimpleAddressFacet

SimpleNameFacet.description: A simple name facet is a grouping of characteristics unique to the personal name (e.g., Dr. John Smith Jr.) held by an identity.
SimpleNameFacet.title: SimpleNameFacet

UcoInherentCharacterizationThing.description: A UCO inherent characterization thing is a grouping of characteristics unique to a particular inherent aspect of a UCO domain object.

UcoObject.description: A UCO object is a representation of a fundamental concept either directly inherent to the cyber domain or indirectly related to the cyber domain and necessary for contextually characterizing cyber domain concepts and relationships. Within the Unified Cyber Ontology (UCO) structure this is the base class acting as a consistent, unifying and interoperable foundation for all explicit and inter-relatable content objects.
